DVD.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a type of computer disc that can store a large amount of information, sound, pictures, and video
DVD.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The film is now out on video and DVD.
DVD.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: digital versatile disk, digital video disk; a type of advanced COMPACT DISK that can carry data, sound, and pictures and that has enough space for a full-length cinema film
